items.title: Bomb Threat
items.instructions: All players roll 1 die. If anyone rolls a 6 before time runs out, press RESOLVED.
items.successText: Bomb defused. Remove 1 Emergency from the board.
items.failText: Explosion shakes the city. Advance Crime Track by 1.

items.title: Hostage Situation
items.instructions: All players roll 1 die. If total rolled is 18+ before time runs out, press RESOLVED.
items.failText: Situation escalates. Add 1 Punk to a random block (max 3).
